parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> High Command

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds icon to a group leader. Returns icon ID, Control icons visibility with [[setGroupIconsVisible]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> group '''addGroupIcon''' [iconClass, offset]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] - group to add icon to

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [iconClass, offset] - [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> iconClass: [[String]] - class name of an icon from <tt>CfgGroupIcons</tt>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> offset (Optional): [[Array]] - X and Y offsets of the icon in form [offsetX, offsetY]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - Icon ID

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>groupName [[addGroupIcon]] ["b_inf", [offsetX, offsetY]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[clearGroupIcons]], [[getGroupIcon]], [[getGroupIconParams]], [[groupIconSelectable]], [[groupIconsVisible]], [[onGroupIconClick]], [[removeGroupIcon]], [[setGroupIcon]], [[setGroupIconParams]], [[setGroupIconsSelectable]], [[setGroupIconsVisible]]
</value></part></template>
